amendment.description: To provide for improved assessment of public-private competition for work performed by civilian employees of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3257 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3257 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6716-6717) To provide for improved assessment of public-private competition for work performed by civilian employees of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3257 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3257 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
